name: Aster Fpv Drone Simulator
description:
Aster Fpv is the Fpv Drone simulator including fps mode, play in multiplayer or alone

Sneak between moving construction cranes.
Practice chasing cars.
Race solo or in multiplayer between buildings and natural obstacles.

** The new feature is the missions available on the fps mode **

In Multiplayer

- Fps mode: Compete with other players with a rocket launcher or a machine gun and complete missions.
- Race mode: Try to be the 1st or at the top of the ranking.
- Free mode: Explore the places and train to perfect your piloting level

Solo mode

- Race mode: Try to beat your best time
- Free mode: Explore the places and practice your driving skills
